name: Achievements printer part 1
description:
Achievement printer is simple basketball game. You need swipe the ball towards the hoop to score
Here some game features
- 2999 Achievements
- Nice sound and graphics
- Simple gameplay
- 3 kind of modes ( endless, time challenge and sliding)
- 11 Types of balls
- Custom achievements

HOW TO PLAY
Swipe the ball towards the hoop to score.
Collect stars to unlock new balls. Improve your skills and become the master of the hoop.
Very Fun! Game for everybody!
